html: Britain is on track to record the lowest deficit for a financial year in a decade, according to official figures. The budget deficit fell by £2.5 billion to £41.4 billion in the 11 months to February, the lowest figure for the month of February since 2008.
text:
Britain is on track to record the lowest deficit for a financial year in a decade, according to official figures.
The budget deficit fell by £2.5 billion to £41.4 billion in the 11 months to February, the lowest figure for the month of February since 2008.
